name: SWE Product 360 Degree View
author: Sanjay

sections.description: Get rid of boaring default product slider, SWE Product 360 degree View provide you the best 360 view of you product by 360 degree rotation along with amazing Product Thumbnail carausal on side navigation, Product slider with Expand view of product image diffrent from boaring zoom of product image, There is an option to check either 360 dgree view feature enable or disable from backend.
sections.installation:
1. Unzip and upload plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress if not activated
  3. Check any product by editing there should be option to add 360 Degree Product images.
sections.faq:
Is this requires WooCommerce plugin installed and activated before us

Yes it will only work when WooCommerce plugin installed and activated

Can hide 360 Degree icon

Yes.

How many product images can we add on 360 Degree rotation

No limitation, As much as you want, if there should be large varation of images then there will be smooth rotation of product image.
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • First Release of SWE Product 360 Degree view.
